experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: Developed an AI-based zero-day vulnerability detection system with two main modules that focus on static code analysis and behavior analysis respectively. The first module performs static code analysis on Java codebases with a custom-trained LLM to detect security flaws. The second module analyzes user behavior to detect vulnerabilities missed by code analysis, using LLM for feature extraction and a deep neural network for anomaly detection.

experience.title: Marketing Head
experience.description: Led logistics and PR for a 12-hour hackathon.

projects.name: ELSA: Emotional Support Chatbot
projects.description: Designed a multimodal AI chatbot supporting 3 input modes, integrated Google Speech-to-Text, RAG, FAISS pipeline, and Groq LLM API for empathetic replies.

projects.name: DefenceX
projects.description: AI tool to detect scam calls by fine-tuning DistilBERT on call transcripts. Integrated Gemini API with prompt engineering to explain results in simple terms.

projects.name: LegalLens
projects.description: AI tool that summarizes legal documents and supports multilingual search. Uses a Locally hosted LLaMA-based model to deliver concise summaries. OCR and PyMuPDF to handle scanned PDF and legal text.
